local_intent: Align on the fridge handle, close the gripper with force 20 to acquire it, and verify grasp.
assumptions: TCP yaw already set to 90 deg
Gripper was opened prior to grasp attempt
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT grasp phase: detect handle, approach/align (tolerance 0.005, 1200 ms), close gripper (force 20, 800 ms), then verify by checking the handle is in the gripper.
